The summary of the essence of the sevenfold collection of epistemology was composed by rDo rje dbang grags, the great learned Lama, the buddhism monk well-learned in the vast (three) baskets, holding the burden of vows, in the monastery of gTe’ ra bkra shis dbu mang, in the year of the fire-female-ox, in the 7th 500-year cycle of the teaching of the Sugata. The abbridged summary of the Summary of the Essence of Epistemology – the precious vajra (of) wisdom (ye shes rdo rje rin po che) is completed. It was composed for the sake of those who rejoice in what is somewhat summarized, by the upasaka Chos kyi bzhad pa, after a few years had passed since thad listend profusely direcly from the Lama, having been requested by Thod pa bSod nams seng ge, the spiritual teacher of g.Yag rde.
